data.name: Rule0063GiveFieldMoreDescriptiveNameTitle
data.value: Give field more describing name.

data.name: Rule0063GiveFieldMoreDescriptiveNameFormat
data.value: Consider naming field with a more descriptive name: '{0}'.

data.name: Rule0063GiveFieldMoreDescriptiveNameDescription

data.name: Rule0064TableFieldMissingToolTipTitle
data.value: Missing ToolTip property on table field.

data.name: Rule0064TableFieldMissingToolTipFormat
data.value: A value for the ToolTip property is missing for the table field {0} of page field {1}. Consider adding a ToolTip for table field {0} and/or removing the ToolTip from page field {1}.

data.name: Rule0064TableFieldMissingToolTipDescription
data.value: Informs the user that it is better to apply the ToolTip property on the table field instead of the page field.

data.name: Rule0065EventSubscriberVarCheckTitle
data.value: Event subscriber var keyword mismatch.

data.name: Rule0065EventSubscriberVarCheckFormat
data.value: Parameter '{0}' must use the 'var' keyword if the publisher parameter is 'var'.

data.name: Rule0065EventSubscriberVarCheckDescription
data.value: Ensures that event subscriber methods use 'var' keyword for parameters as defined by event publisher.

data.name: Rule0066DuplicateToolTipBetweenPageAndTableTitle
data.value: Duplicate ToolTip between page and table field.

data.name: Rule0066DuplicateToolTipBetweenPageAndTableFormat
data.value: The ToolTip property of page field {0} and it's table field {1} have the same value and therefore the page field's ToolTip can be removed.

data.name: Rule0066DuplicateToolTipBetweenPageAndTableDescription
data.value: Informs the user that it is better to only apply the ToolTip property on the table field when the page fields ToolTip is the same.

data.name: Rule0067DisableNotBlankOnSingleFieldPrimaryKeyTitle
data.value: Set NotBlank to false when 'No. Series' TableRelation exists.

data.name: Rule0067DisableNotBlankOnSingleFieldPrimaryKeyFormat
data.value: The NotBlank property should be set to false (or removed) if a TableRelation of 'No. Series' is present on the table.

data.name: Rule0067DisableNotBlankOnSingleFieldPrimaryKeyDescription
data.value: When the 'No. Series' TableRelation is present on the table, assigning the primary key might occur after inserting the record, which could cause an error due to the NotBlank property.

data.name: Rule0068CheckObjectPermissionTitle
data.value: The Object has missing permissions

data.name: Rule0068CheckObjectPermissionFormat
data.value: The current object is missing permission "{0}" for tabledata "{1}"

data.name: Rule0068CheckObjectPermissionDescription
data.value: Informs the user that there are missing permission to access tabledata.

data.name: Rule0069EmptyStatementsTitle
data.value: Empty statements should be avoided or should have a leading or trailing comment explaining their use.

data.name: Rule0069EmptyStatementsFormat
data.value: Empty statements should be avoided or should have a leading or trailing comment explaining their use.

data.name: Rule0069EmptyStatementsDescription
data.value: Empty statements should be avoided or should have a leading or trailing comment explaining their use.

data.name: Rule0070ListObjectsAreOneBasedTitle
data.value: Zero index access on 1-based List objects.

data.name: Rule0070ListObjectsAreOneBasedFormat
data.value: List objects are 1-based.

data.name: Rule0070ListObjectsAreOneBasedDescription
data.value: List objects are 1-based, meaning indexing starts from 1 instead of the conventional 0.

data.name: Rule0071DoNotSetIsHandledToFalseTitle
data.value: Incorrect 'IsHandled' parameter assignment.

data.name: Rule0071DoNotSetIsHandledToFalseFormat
data.value: Do not set the 'IsHandled' parameter to 'false' or any value that may be evaluated as false.

data.name: Rule0071DoNotSetIsHandledToFalseDescription
data.value: The 'IsHandled' parameter must always be set to 'true' when handled. Avoid assigning 'false' or any value that may be evaluated as false.

data.name: Rule0072CheckProcedureDocumentationCommentTitle
data.value: The documentation comment must match the procedure syntax.

data.name: Rule0072CheckProcedureDocumentationCommentFormat
data.value: The documentation comment does not match the procedure syntax.

data.name: Rule0072CheckProcedureDocumentationCommentDescription
data.value: The documentation comment must always match the procedure syntax structure exactly.

data.name: Rule0073EventPublisherIsHandledByVarTitle
data.value: Handled parameters in event signatures should be passed by var.

data.name: Rule0073EventPublisherIsHandledByVarFormat
data.value: The Handled parameter in the event signature should be passed by var for proper event handling.

data.name: Rule0073EventPublisherIsHandledByVarDescription
data.value: Identifies event parameters of type boolean named IsHandled or Handled that are not passed by var.

data.name: Rule0074FlowFilterAssignmentTitle
data.value: Set values for FlowFilter fields using filtering methods.

data.name: Rule0074FlowFilterAssignmentFormat
data.value: Direct assignment to the {0} field of type FlowFilter invalidates the filter logic for calculations. Use .SetFilter() or .SetRange() to set the filter correctly.

data.name: Rule0074FlowFilterAssignmentDescription
data.value: Directly assigning values to FlowFilter fields bypasses their purpose and invalidates the filtering logic, resulting in incorrect or unintended calculations. Instead, use the .SetFilter() or .SetRange() methods to define the appropriate filters.

data.name: Rule0075RecordGetProcedureArgumentsTitle
data.value: Incorrect number or type of arguments in .Get() method on Record object.

data.name: Rule0075RecordGetProcedureArgumentsFormat
data.value: Invalid arguments in .Get() method for record {0}: {1}.

data.name: Rule0075RecordGetProcedureArgumentsDescription
data.value: This rule ensures that calls to the built-in .Get() procedure on Record objects have the correct number and types of arguments matching the primary key (PK) of the record in question.

data.name: Rule0076TableRelationTooLongTitle
data.value: Table relation field length mismatch

data.name: Rule0076TableRelationTooLongFormat
data.value: The related field has length {0} ({1}) which is longer than the current field length {2} ({3})

data.name: Rule0076TableRelationTooLongDescription
data.value: The field with table relation should have at least the same length as the referenced field.

data.name: Rule0077UseParenthesisForFunctionCallTitle
data.value: Function calls should have parenthesis even if they do not have any parameters.

data.name: Rule0077UseParenthesisForFunctionCallFormat
data.value: You must specify open and close parenthesis after '{0}'

data.name: Rule0077UseParenthesisForFunctionCallDescription
data.value: You must specify open and close parenthesis after '{0}'

data.name: Fix0077MissingParenthesisCodeAction
data.value: Add parenthesis

data.name: Fix0019DataClassificationFieldEqualsTableCodeAction
data.value: Remove DataClassification

data.name: Fix0024SemicolonAfterMethodOrTriggerDeclarationCodeAction
data.value: Remove Semicolon

data.name: Rule0078TemporaryRecordsTitle
data.value: Temporary records should not trigger the table triggers.

data.name: Rule0078TemporaryRecordsFormat
data.value: Temporary records should not trigger the table triggers.

data.name: Rule0078TemporaryRecordsDescription
data.value: Temporary records should not trigger the table triggers.

data.name: Rule0079NonPublicEventPublisherTitle
data.value: Event Publishers should be local or internal to allow for future parameter extensions.

data.name: Rule0079NonPublicEventPublisherFormat
data.value: Event Publishers should be local or internal to allow for future parameter extensions.

data.name: Rule0079NonPublicEventPublisherDescription
data.value: Event Publishers should be local or internal to allow for future parameter extensions.

data.name: Rule0080AnalyzeJsonTokenJPathTitle
data.value: Replace double quotes in JPath expressions with two single quotes.

data.name: Rule0080AnalyzeJsonTokenJPathFormat
data.value: Double quote character detected in JPath expression. Replace all double quotes (") with two single quotes ('').

data.name: Rule0080AnalyzeJsonTokenJPathDescription
data.value: Detects and warns against the use of double-quote (") characters in JPath expressions.

data.name: Rule0081UseIsEmptyMethodTitle
data.value: Use Rec.IsEmpty() for checking record existence.

data.name: Rule0081UseIsEmptyMethodFormat
data.value: Avoid using {0}.Count() for checking record existence. Use {0}.IsEmpty() instead for better performance.

data.name: Rule0081UseIsEmptyMethodDescription
data.value: To check for the existence of records, use the more efficient Rec.IsEmpty() function instead of Rec.Count().

data.name: Rule0082UseQueryOrFindWithNextTitle
data.value: Consider using a Query object or Rec.Find('-') with Rec.Next() for checking exactly one record.

data.name: Rule0082UseQueryOrFindWithNextFormat
data.value: Consider using a Query object or {0}.Find('-') together with {0}.Next() instead of {0}.Count() for faster and more efficient record checks.

data.name: Rule0082UseQueryOrFindWithNextDescription
data.value: Instead of relying on Rec.Count(), consider using a Query object or a combination of Rec.Find('-') and Rec.Next() for faster and more efficient record checks.

data.name: Rule0083BuiltInDateTimeMethodTitle
data.value: Use new Date/Time/DateTime methods for extracting parts.

data.name: Rule0083BuiltInDateTimeMethodFormat
data.value: Use the new method {0}.{1} to extract specific parts of date/time values.

data.name: Rule0083BuiltInDateTimeMethodDescription
data.value: Replace outdated functions for extracting specific parts of Date, Time, and DateTime types (such as day, month, hour, or second) with the new, modernized methods.

data.name: Fix0083BuiltInDateTimeMethodCodeAction
data.value: Use modern Date/Time/DateTime method

data.name: Rule0084UseReturnValueForErrorHandlingTitle
data.value: Use return value for better error handling.

data.name: Rule0084UseReturnValueForErrorHandlingFormat
data.value: The return value of the '{0}' method must be used to improve error handling or provide meaningful feedback to the user.

data.name: Rule0084UseReturnValueForErrorHandlingDescription
data.value: Database read methods, like Record.Get(), returns a boolean indicating whether the record was successfully retrieved. Failing to use this return value can lead to uncaught errors, poor error handling, and a lack of actionable feedback for users when something goes wrong.

data.name: Rule0085LFSeparatorTitle
data.value: Use the (CR)LFSeparator from the "Type Helper" codeunit.

data.name: Rule0085LFSeparatorFormat
data.value: Use the (CR)LFSeparator from the "Type Helper" codeunit from the Base Application to define a line feed (LF) or carriage return (CR) variable.

data.name: Rule0085LFSeparatorDescription
data.value: Avoid manually creating helper methods or assigning character values (e.g., Char := 10 or Text[1] := 10) to define line feed (LF) or carriage return (CR) variables. Instead, use the LFSeparator and CRLFSeparator constants provided by the "Type Helper" codeunit from the Base Application.

data.name: Rule0086PageStyleDataTypeTitle
data.value: Use the new PageStyle datatype instead string literals.

data.name: Rule0086PageStyleDataTypeFormat
data.value: Avoid using the string literal '{0}' for page styling. Use the PageStyle datatype instead (PageStyle::{1}).

data.name: Rule0086PageStyleDataTypeDescription
data.value: Adopting the use of the new PageStyle datatype allows to more easily get the supported pagestyles via IntelliSense and avoids incorrect behaviour when a typo is made in hardcoded strings or label variables.

data.name: Rule0087UseIsNullGuidTitle
data.value: Use IsNullGuid() to check for empty GUID values.

data.name: Rule0087UseIsNullGuidFormat
data.value: Use 'IsNullGuid({0})' method instead of comparing the GUID '{0}' with {1}, as this will result in a runtime error.

data.name: Rule0087UseIsNullGuidDescription
data.value: When checking if a GUID is empty, avoid using direct comparisons such as MyGuid = '', as this will result in a runtime error due to the invalid GUID format. Instead, use the IsNullGuid() method to perform the check safely and correctly.

data.name: Rule0088AvoidOptionTypesTitle
data.value: Option types should be avoided, use enum if applicable

data.name: Rule0088AvoidOptionTypesFormat
data.value: Option types should be avoided, use enum if applicable

data.name: Rule0088AvoidOptionTypesDescription
data.value: Option types should be avoided, use enum if applicable to get rid of some of the bad patterns that come along with option fields.

data.name: Rule0089CognitiveComplexityTitle
data.value: Cognitive Complexity exceeds threshold.

data.name: Rule0089CognitiveComplexityFormat
data.value: Cognitive Complexity: {0} (threshold >={1})

data.name: Rule0089IncrementCognitiveComplexityFormat
data.value: {0}: +{1} (1 increment + {2} nesting penalty)

data.name: Rule0089CognitiveComplexityDescription
data.value: This rule analyzes the cognitive complexity of methods to measure how difficult the code is to understand.

data.name: Rule0091TranslatableTextShouldBeTranslatedTitle
data.value: Labels should be translated.

data.name: Rule0091TranslatableTextShouldBeTranslatedFormat
data.value: {0} is missing a translation in languages: {1}

data.name: Rule0091TranslatableTextShouldBeTranslatedDescription
data.value: Labels and other variants should be translated for every available translation file language.

data.name: Rule0092ProcedureNamePatternTitle
data.value: Procedures must match pattern / must not match pattern.

data.name: Rule0092ProcedureNamePatternFormat
data.value: Procedure name \"{0}\" {1} match {2} \"{3}\"

data.name: Rule0092ProcedureNamePatternDescription
data.value: Procedure names must match the allowed pattern and must not match the disallowed pattern.

data.name: Rule0093GlobalTestMethodRequiresTestAttributeTitle
data.value: Global procedure in test codeunit requires test attribute.

data.name: Rule0093GlobalTestMethodRequiresTestAttributeFormat
data.value: Global procedure \"{0}\" in test codeunit requires [Test] attribute"

data.name: Rule0093GlobalTestMethodRequiresTestAttributeDescription
data.value: Global procedure in test codeunit requires test attribute. Use e.g. library codeunits for public procedures.

data.name: Rule0096UnnecessaryParameterInMethodCallTitle
data.value: Unnecessary parameter.

data.name: Rule0096UnnecessaryParameterInMethodCallFormat
data.value: A method invoked on a record must not contain same variable in parameter list as the one on which the call was made.

data.name: Rule0096UnnecessaryParameterInMethodCallDescription
data.value: A method invoked on a record must not contain same variable in parameter list as the one on which the call was made.
